summary: The manuscript contains a collection of Ælfric's homilies, saints' lives, which are included with other homiletic material by Wulfstan, Latin sermons and musical annotations.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Cum multa turba esset cum nec haberent quod manduca | rest: ˥ Reliqua. | Marcus se godspellere cƿæð on þissum dæ'

notes.head: Note
notes.body: The text in the manuscript ends at Godden 1979, l. 132, p. 234.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'habban god Þu ƿylt habban hælu Þines lichoman.'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'on ealra ƿor [u] (unclear: overwrite) da ƿoruld. AMEN'

notes.head: Note
notes.body: The text begins at Godden 1979, l. 111, p. 238.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'IN illo Tempore; Dixit iesus discipulis suis | EGO sum pastor bonus.. Ðis godspel þe nu geræd ƿæs'

notes.head: Note
notes.body: The text includes Clemoes 1997, ll. 1-61, p. 313.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'sƿyðor cepað; Ne cƿæ he na þæt us beoð '

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'ƿurðmynt on ealra ƿoruld [a] (unclear: overwrite) ƿoruld; AMEN'

notes.head: Note
notes.body: The text ends at Godden 1979, l. 107, p. 271.

notes.head: Note
notes.body: This note was inserted probably xiiex.

notes.head: Note
notes.body: This note was inserted probably s. xii.

notes.head: Note
notes.body: These are sixty-seven homilies on the gospels from Lent to Quinquagesima. Nine items are unique to the Bodley version of the homiliary. A transcription and collation is available in Conti 2004.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): 'Incipit liber catholicorum sermonum anglice in annoI.'

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): 'Sermo ad populum de inicio creature'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þæt ece lif mid gode þe ðe a on ecnesse rixæd; | AMEN

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Erat homo ex phariseis nichodemus nomine; princeps iudeorum & reliqua; | Sum phariseisc mon ƿæs ihaten nichodemus'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ' þam halgæ gaste on ane godcyndnysse. ƿe cƿeðeþ AMEN. '

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'SUME MEN NUTEN iƿiss for heoræ nytenessæ'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'mid þæs halgæn gastes gyfe. þam is æfre an ƿuldor ˥ an ƿurðment. Amen'.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): 'Erat quidam regulus cuius filius infirmabatur capharnaum & RELINQUIA'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'ðam is anƿeald ˥ ƿuldor ˥ ƿurðment on ecnysse á to ƿorulde. AMEN;'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Simile est regnum celorum homini regi & reliqua. CRIs (addition: ) tes íƿunæ ƿæs ðæt he ƿolde oft spæcæn'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'beo him á á ƿurðmynt ˥ ƿuldor AMEN. AMEN'

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Five lines left blank at the end of fol. 11v.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): 'De patientia Iob ˥ Constantia quomodo in dolore firmus in fide perseuerauerit

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Míne gebroðræ þe rædeþ nu æt godes þenunge be þam eadige ƿære iob.'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þe ðe ane is god á á | on ecenysse. AMEN; '

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'HER ONGINNÆÐ to sæcgæn be þam treowe þe ðeo rode ƿæs of íƿroht.'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'ðæ gyt | oð þysne andƿeardan dæg heo ihealdene ƿeron Amen Amen;'

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Published with a facing-page translation in Napier 1894

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Ðe hælend crist syððan he to þisse liue com'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'on þare he rixæð mid alle his halgum on alre ƿorulda ƿoruld a butan ende. | on eccenysse. AMEN'

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): 'Passio sancti laurentii martyris iiii to idus augusti.'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'he þro | ƿode mid kene mode monigfealde tintreda mid ðam he orsorglice on ecenysse | wynuldræð amen

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): 'Passio sancti bartholomei apostoli. viii. kalendas. septembris.'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Wyrdwriteræs sæcgæð þet ðreo leodscipæs beoþ ihanten india'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'Sy him ƿyldor ˥ lof. | on alre ƿoruldæ ƿoruld. AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Men ða leofeste wurðie we nu on andƿeardnysse þa gebyrdtide þære | eadige femne sancte matia '

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: he us gife sisum lif. ˥ ece eadig | nyssæ a buton ends. god us to þam fylste. amen

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): 'Passio sancti mathei apostolix kalendas octobris'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: ' þe apostol matheus and godspellere becom'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Beo þæs gode lof a buton | end on ecnesse. AMEN

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Incipit uita sancti Martini episcopiiiia. idus Novembris

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þe þe on ecnysse rixæð almihtig ƿealdend.'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þe ðe ane ƿælt alræ isceaftæ. Amen'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Men þa leofeste hƿilon ær ƿe sæden eoƿ þone (addition: ) pistol'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ðe ðe leofæð ˥ rixæð on alræ ƿoruldæ ƿoruld. Amen

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Cum autem descendisset iesus de monte.. Mathevs ðe godspellere ƿrat on ðissere godspellice | redinge'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: '˥ an god on ane | dogcundnesse effre ƿuniende buton anginne ˥ ende'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Ƿe cƿæðæð on gerimcræfte cathedra sancti petri.'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'He geƿat þa to heofenum to hælende criste. ðam is ƿuldor ˥ ƿurðment a | on alræ ƿoruldæ ƿoruld. AMEN.'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Vre almihtig sc (addition: ) uppend. ðe ðe alle isceaftæ'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: þe ðe ƿeald alle þing mid fæder ˥ mid þam halgæ gaste a on ecnesse. AMEN

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'ƿe yllæð sæcgæn bi þisse andwearde tide'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'ƿe him | singæð ecelice alleluia buten gesƿinke. Amen

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Simile est regnum celorum homini patrifamilias and RELIQUIA. | Se hælend cƿæð'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þe ðe leofæð ˥ rixæð nu ˥ symle a on ƿorulde. Amen'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Cum turba plurima plurima convenirent as iesum & cetera. | Oon sumere tide þa þa mucel meniu samod comen to þam hælende'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þæt ece lif habben moten on alre ƿoruldæ | ƿoruld a buton ende. AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Assumpsit iesus duodecim discipulos suos secreto & ait & cetera. | Her is ired on þisse godspelle'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þe ðe leofæð ˥ rixæ | a on alræ ƿoruldæ ƿoruld a buton ende AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Men þa leofeste ic cyðe eow þæt ðreo þing'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'mid fæder ˥ mid sune ˥ mid þam halge gaste leofæþ | ˥ rixæð þurh alræ ƿoruldæ ƿoruld a on ecnesse a buton ende AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: ' Men þa leofeste Ƿe ƿyllæð her | specan feaƿum ƿordum'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'mid fæder. ˥ mid sunu. ˥ mid þam | halgum gaste a on alræ ƿoruldæ ƿoruld a buton ende Amen'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Ambulans iesus iuxte mare galilee. & RELIQUA; CRist on sume tide ferde ƿið þare galileiscen sæ'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'beo ƿuldor | ˥ lof hælende criste a on alræ ƿoruldæ ƿoruld a buton ende Amen.'

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Natale sancti eadmundi | regis & martyris.

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: a mid his heofenlice fæder ˥ þa [...]

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'ðam beo ƿuldor ˥ lof on ecnesse. AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Đe godspellere lucas awrat on ðissum dægðerlican godspelle'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: þe ðe leofað ˥ rixað on alra ƿorulda ƿorld. AMEN

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: a on annesse ðæs halgan gastes on ealra ƿeorulda ƿeorld. Amen

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: þe ðe leofað and rixað a buten ende. AMEN

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Postquam impleti sunt dies purgatoris marie & RELIQU. | God bead on ðære alde lage'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ðe þe leofað ant | rixað a buton ende. AMEN

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Leofa man ic axie þe on drihtnes namen hƿylces geleafan ðu beo to gode'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: he sylf leofað ˥ rixað mid fæder ant | sunæ. ˥ halig gast. a on ecnesse AMEN

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'CRITES ðroƿung ƿæs ired nu beforen us'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: þe ðe leofað ˥ rixað a buton ende Amen

notes.head: Addition
notes.body: Circlice þeawas forbeodað to secgenne ænig spel on ðam ðrym swygdagas

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Maria magdalene & maria iacobi & salomee & RELIQUA. | Oft ge hyrdon embe ðæs hælendes ærist'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'Þe ƿillað nu þis god | spel eoƿ reccen. þe her nu ired ƿæs eoƿre leafan to trymmingge.'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Dixit iesus discipulis suis.. Þe hælend cƿeð to his leorningcnihtas hƿylc eoƿer is þe hafað sumne freond;'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þe ðe leofað ˥ | rixað mid fæder ˥ mid halge gaste a buton ende Amen'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'LVcas þe godspelle us munode on ðisse pistolrædinge'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ðe þe leofað ˥ rixað mid þam almihtiga fæder ˥ þam halga gaste. a on ecnesse. | Amen Amen

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'FRAM ÐAM halgan æsterlican dæge beoð itealde fiftige daga to þisse dæge.'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ðe þe leofað ˥ rixað a buton ende AMEN

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): 'Natiuitas Sancti iohannis Baptiste; Uiii. kalendas. Ivlii;'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Đe GOdspellere lucas aƿrat on cristes bec be accænnednesse Iohannis'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þam beo ƿuldor ˥ | lof mid fæder ˥ galgum gaste a on acnesse AMEN'

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): De Passione sanctorum Apostolorum petri & pauli

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Uenit iesus in partes.. MATHEUS ðe godspellere wrat on ðære godspellicen isetnysse'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'ðe him ne bið i | tyðod naðor ne synnæ forgifenysse. ne infær ðæs heofenlican rices'

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): De Passione Apostolorum | petri & pauli'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Ƿe ƿyllað eafter ðisse godsplle eoƿ ræccan ðara apostola drohtinga'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ðam beo ƿuldor ˥ lof a on ecnesse. AMEN

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: heo mid heom ˥ mid gode þæt ece lif habben moten

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Ælc cristene man sceal æfter rihte cunnan ægðer ge | his pater noster ge his credan'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: þe ðe þurh ƿunæð on þrynnysse an almihtig god. a on ecnesse Amen

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'ĐE GODspellere lucas beleac þisses dæges godspel'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: beo | him ƿuldor ˥ lof a on ecnysse AMEN

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Homo quidam erat diues et induebatur.. ÞE ƿældendæ drihten sæde þis bigspel'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'heo þreo on annre godcynd | nysse ƿuniende butan anginne. ˥ endunge. a on ƿerolde AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Erant adpropinquantes.. Þæt halige godspel us sæð þæt refan ˥ synfulle men neahleacedon'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þe ðe leofað ˥ rixað mid fader on an | nesse þæs halgan gastes on alræ ƿorulda ƿoruld. AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Cum appropinquaret iesus hierusalem.. ON summere tide ƿæs ðe hælende farende'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'Beo ðe lof ˥ ƿuldor on alræ ƿoruldæ ƿoruld. AMEN.'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Ibat iesus in ciuitatem que uocatur naim.. URE drihten ferde to sumere burig'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'Heo ðry an ælmihtigæ god unto dæledlic a on ecnysse rixiende. AMEM'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Loquebatur iesus.. DRIHTEN ƿæs specende on sumere tide'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þu ðe leofest ˥ rixost mid ðam | ecen fæder ˥ halgum gaste on alræ ƿerolda ƿeoruld AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Preteriens iesus uidit hominem cecum a natiuitate. & RELIQUA | Vre drihten ðe mildheortæ hælend'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: '˥ ƿe ƿurdon onlihte ðurh ðone lyfigiendan drihten þa leofæð a on | ecnysse. AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Hieronimus ðe halga sacerd ƿrat ænne pistol'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ðe þe leofæð ˥ rixæð mid fæder ˥ halgæ gaste on alre ƿeorldæ ƿeoruld AMEN

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Halige larƿeas sædon þæt seo geleaffule gelaðung'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þæt ƿe to ðare ecan freolstide becumen'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Uidens iesus turbas asscendit in montem. Et Reliqua. | Đæt halige godspel þe lutle ǽr ætforen eoƿ íræd'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'scyppend. ˥ alysend. ealra halgenæ mid fæder. ˥ mid halgum gaste. a on ecenesse AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: ' Matheus þe godspellere aƿrát on cristes béc'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'on alræ weorulda weoruld | á to tídan fore Amen.'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'On ðissum dæge we wurðiæð on ure lofsange'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þam is wuldor ˥ wyrdmend on ealræ weoruldæ weorld | AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Cum audieritis prelia & seditiones nolite terreri & RELIQUA. | De hælend foresæde his leorningcnihtum'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'Béo him wul | dor ˥ wyrðmynt on alræ weoruldæ weoruld. AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Amen amen dico uobis nisi granum frumenti..Soð soð ic eow secge gif þæt ísawene'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'on anre godcundnesse on áne mægenðryme on anúm | gecynde á on ecnesse. AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Homo quidam peregre proficisscens uocauit seruos suos...URE drihten sæde þis bigspel his leorningcnihtæs'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Béo lof þam laforde þe leofæð on ecnesse æffre buton ánginne on endeleasúm | mægenþrymme Amen'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Simile est regnum celorum decem uirginibus...Þe hælend sæde bigspel ilomlice be gehwilce þingum'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'Ðe ðe leofæð ˥ rixæð mid his heofenlice fæder | ˥ þam halga gaste on ealrae weorlda weorld Amen'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Men ða leofeste cƿæð sanctus greogorius. Ic eoƿ halsige on þone drihten'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: God | almihtige us to þam fultumige on ecnesse AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Đe ælmihtigæ scyppend þa þa he englæs isceop'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: '˥ beð for þi isette hi sigefesta dæda on | ðam bocum on bibliothecan gode to ƿurðmente

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Leofe men ealle cristenum manne is mycel neod þæt heo heora fuluhtes scead ƿitan'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'beo lof. ˥ | ƿuldor on ealra ƿeorlda ƿerld á buton ende AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Ælfricus abbas Wulfstano uenerabili archiepiscopo salutem...Us biscopum dafenað þæt ƿe ða boclican lare'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þæt ge habban þa mæde þe | ure hælend behet þam ðe him þeniæð. Euge serue bone ˥ fidelis quia super pauca fuisti fidelis | supra multa te co[n]stituam intra in gaudium domini tui sequitur'

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): 'De secunda epistola quando diuidis | crisma.'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Eal'l'æ ge mæssepreostas mine gebroðre ƿe secgæð eoƿ'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'heo ðreo | an god æfre rixiende AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Spiritus sanctus septenaria operatione..Isayas þe ƿitegæ wrat on his ƿitegunge be ðam | halga gaste'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'Be ðissum ðeaƿum monn mæg þone mon tocnawn hƿæðer him godes | gaste on ƿunige. oððe þæs gramlichen deofles'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Interrogatus iesus a discipulis de consummacione seculi dixit eis...Leofa men Ure drihtines apostoli axodon hine sylfne embe þissere ƿeorlde endunge'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'mid þam ðe leofæð ˥ rixæð | áá buton ende AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Leofæn men gecnaƿæð þæt soð is. Ðeos ƿeorld is on ofste'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þa murhðe þe gad hæfð | ígearoƿæd ðam ðe his ƿillan on ƿeorolde ƿurcæð. God ure hælpe AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Leofæ men. Us is deope beboden þæt we geornlice myngian and læran scylan'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: þenne earnige we us ece blisse æt þam ðe | leofæð ˥ rixæð a buton ende AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Mine gebroþræ þa leofestan ƿe ƿylleð sume drihtenlice spæce'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'mid his | icorene halgum mid his almihtigæ fæder. ˥ þam halgum gaste on alre ƿeorldæ ƿeorld AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Monegum is cuð þeo halige steow sancti michaelis'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'ðe ðe leofað ˥ rixað á on ecnesse AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Nuptie quidem facte sunt in chana galilęę & RELIQUA. | Iohannes þe godspellere cwæð on þam godspellere lare'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þe þe leofæð ant rixað mid fæder ˥ þam halga gaste | á on ecnesse AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: '[S]ancta maria ƿes ðreo ˥ sixti ƿinter ða heo of middenærde ferde..'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: '˥ heo ƿes efter him sistene gær on ðissere ƿorlde'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Ala ge broðræ aræreð eoƿre heorte to ðam heofenlice gode'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þe ðe mid his ece fæder. ˥ mid þam halgæ gaste leofæð ˥ rixæð á on ecenesse AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Men þa leofestæ ƿe ƿullæð eoƿ sæggæn bi þare halgæ tide'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'þam drihtne fultumiende | þe ðe leofæð ˥ rixæð áá on ecenesse. AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Men þa leofeste sanctus matheus þe godspellere þe ðis godspel wrat..'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'mis þam heofenlice kynge. þe leofeð ˥ rixæð on | alræ worldæ world AMEN'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Ic eow bidde leofemen þæt sƿa ofte swa ge faren bi ricre monnæ burines'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'almihtig drihten leofæð ant rixæð mid alle his halgæn | á abuten ende amen'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): 'Pater noster qui es in celis'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Explicit (Latin): 'sed potius liberet nos ab omni malo amen.'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): 'Credo in deum patrem omnipotentem | creatorem celi'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body:
Explicit (Latin): 'Amen uero uerbum
est ebraicum quoque latine | dicitur uere fideliter siue fiat. amen.'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Auarus þæt is gytsere on englisc. auaricia is | gytsunge'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Us sægð þeo halige cristes boc. þæt ure | hælend crist arerde þreo men of dea | þe'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'sƿa sƿa he dyde ær þurh him sylfum on his andweardnesse'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Matheus þe godspellere us sæde þis godspel'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: '˥ we sceolon beon gode under ðeode þe alle þing isceop þe þe ane rixæð | on ecnesse Amen'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'ðe wes bold [ ] gebyld. er þu iboren were'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: 'Næle hit nan | mit fingres feire stracien'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): 'In primo notandum quod hoc nomen canticum'

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): '[E]Gredemini & uidete filie...Sicut nemo teste apostolo | nouit que sunt hominis'

notes.head: Overview:
notes.body: Overview: Single frame. Flesh outer. Ruling in brown crayon on both sides of the folio. Single bounding lines. No visible pricking on external margins, but the ruled lines are 9 mm apart within the main frame. Small pricks appear on the top and lower margin to guide the ruling of the vertical bounding lines of the frame. Writing on the first line. See diagram.

notes.head: Overview:
notes.body: Overview: Double columns. Ruling in pencil across the columns, but within the two external bounding lines. Single bounding lines. Small pricks appear on internal margin, near the gutter, and external margins ca. 6 mm apart to guide line ruling still visible, some have been cut prior to binding. Four small pricks appear on the top and lower margin to guide the ruling of the vertical four bounding lines of the columns, which are respectively 70, 9, 70 mm in width. See diagram.

notes.head: Overview:
notes.body: Overview: Single column. Ruling in pencil within the two external bounding lines. Double bounding lines 10 mm apart. Small pricks appear on the external margins ca. 8 mm apart to guide line ruling still visible, some have been cut prior to binding. Four small pricks, which are still occasionally visible, appear on the top and lower margin to guide the ruling of the vertical bounding line. The first three and last three ruling lines are ruled accross the frame. Fols 13-20 seem to have been pricked internally, bear the gutter. See diagram.

notes.head: Overview:
notes.body: Overview: Single columns. Ruling in pencil within the two external bounding lines. Double bounding lines 6 mm apart. Small pricks appear on the external margins ca. 7 mm apart to guide line ruling still visible, some have been cut prior to binding. Four small pricks appear on the top and lower margin to guide the ruling of the vertical four bounding lines. See diagram.

notes.head: Overview:
notes.body: Overview: Single columns. Ruling in pencil within the two external bounding lines. Double bounding lines 6 mm apart. Small pricks appear on the external and internal margins ca. 7 mm apart to guide line ruling still visible, some have been cut prior to binding. Four small pricks appear on the top and lower margin to guide the ruling of the vertical four bounding lines. See diagram.

notes.head: Dimensions:
notes.body: Dimensions: 238 mm x 60 mm; ruled column

notes.head: Overview:
notes.body: Overview: Double columns. Ruling in pencil across the columns, but within the two external bounding lines. Double bounding lines on both side of the column 7 mm apart. Small pricks appear on the external margin ca. 7 mm apart to guide line ruling still visible, some have been cut prior to binding. Seven small pricks appear on the top margin to guide the ruling of the vertical four bounding lines of the columns.

accompanying: An old Bodleian shelfmark 'NE.F.4.12.' with the leather of the spine, which was cut from the former binding is pasted onto the backcover.

history.provenance: It has been suggested that the manuscript has a West Midlands provenance, although Kitson offers the Hereford area as an alternative on the base of some of the dialectal features (for a recent discussion, see Kitson 1992, p. 34 and Wilcox 2008, p. 71 and Conti 2011).
history.acquisition: Sir Robert Cotton gave 'Catholici Sermones lingua et charactere Saxonico' to the Bodleian in 1601: the writing on the first leaves, but not the rest, could be called 'Saxon'. Wanley 1705, p. 15'.

admin: Manuscript described by Aidan Conti and Orietta Da Rold with the assistance of Helena Cooper and Hollie Morgan (2010; 2013).
